008 *******************************************************************************/
009package Ch22_PixelInterpolation;
010
011import Ch21_GeometricOperations.Draw_Test_Grid;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
014import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
017import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
018import imagingbook.common.image.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
019import imagingbook.common.image.access.ImageAccessor;
020import imagingbook.common.image.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
021
022/**
023 * <p>
024 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of various pixel interpolation
025 * methods and out-of-bounds strategies. Sub-pixel translation is used as the
026 * geometric transformation (parameters can be specified). Note the use if the
027 * {@link ImageAccessor} class which gives uniform access to all types of
028 * images. See Ch. 22 of [1] for more details.
029 * </p>
030 * <p>
031 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
032 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
033 * </p>
034 * 
035 * @author WB
036 * @version 2022/11/28
037 * 
038 * @see InterpolationMethod
039 * @see OutOfBoundsStrategy
040 * @see ImageAccessor
041 */
042public class Pixel_Interpolation_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
043        
044        private static InterpolationMethod IPM = InterpolationMethod.Bicubic;
045        private static OutOfBoundsStrategy OBS = OutOfBoundsStrategy.ZeroValues;
046        
047        private static double dx = 10.50;       // translation parameters
048        private static double dy = -3.25;
049        
050        private ImagePlus im;
051        
052        /**
053         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
054         * is currently open.
055         */
056        public Pixel_Interpolation_Demo() {
057//              if (IjUtils.noCurrentImage()) {
058//                      DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Kepler);
059//              }
060                if (IjUtils.noCurrentImage() && DialogUtils.askForSampleImage()) {
061                        IjUtils.runPlugIn(Draw_Test_Grid.class);
062                }
063        }
064        
065        // ----------------------------------------
066        
067    @Override
068        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
069        this.im = im;
070        return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
071    }
072
073    @Override
074        public void run(ImageProcessor source) {
075        if (!runDialog())
076                        return;
077        
078        final int w = source.getWidth();
079        final int h = source.getHeight();
080        
081        // create the target image (same type as source):
082        ImageProcessor target = source.createProcessor(w, h);
083        
084        // create ImageAccessor's for the source and target  image:
085        ImageAccessor sA = ImageAccessor.create(source, OBS, IPM);
086        ImageAccessor tA = ImageAccessor.create(target);
087        
088        // iterate over all pixels of the target image:
089        for (int u = 0; u < w; u++) {   // discrete target position (u,v)
090                for (int v = 0; v < h; v++) {
091                        double x = u + dx;      // continuous source position (x,y)
092                        double y = v + dy;
093                        float[] val = sA.getPix(x, y);
094                        tA.setPix(u, v, val);   // update target pixel
095                }
096        }
097        
098        // display the target image:
099        (new ImagePlus(im.getShortTitle() + "-" + IPM.toString(), target)).show();
100    }
101    
102    // --------------------------------------------
103    
104        private boolean runDialog() {
105                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
106                gd.addNumericField("Translation dx", dx, 2);
107                gd.addNumericField("Translation dy", dy, 2);
108                gd.addEnumChoice("Interpolation method", IPM);
109                gd.addEnumChoice("Out-of-bounds strategy", OBS);
110
111                gd.showDialog();
112                if (gd.wasCanceled())
113                        return false;
114                
115                dx = gd.getNextNumber();
116                dy = gd.getNextNumber();
117                IPM = gd.getNextEnumChoice(InterpolationMethod.class);
118                OBS = gd.getNextEnumChoice(OutOfBoundsStrategy.class);
119                return true;
120        }
121}
